trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um calendário é baseado em solar, lunar com base em ou Lunissolar com base em.

trans-unit.source: A date calculation for a particular calendar depends on whether the calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based.
trans-unit.target: Um cálculo de data para um calendário específico depende se o calendário é baseado em solar, lunar com base em ou Lunissolar com base em.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>, and <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> classes are solar-based, the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> and <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> classes are lunar-based,.and the <xref:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar> and <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseLunisolarCalendar> classes are lunisolar-based, thus using solar calculations for the year and lunar calculations for the month and day.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>, e <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>classes são solar baseado o <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar>e <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>classes são lunar baseado, e o <xref:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar>e <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseLunisolarCalendar>classes são Lunissolar baseados, dessa forma usando solar cálculos para o ano e lunares cálculos para o mês e dia.</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseLunisolarCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: A CalendarAlgorithmType value, which is returned by a calendar member such as the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, specifies the foundation for a particular calendar.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de CalendarAlgorithmType, que é retornado por um membro de calendário, como o <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade especifica a base para um calendário específico.</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
Um calendário lunar com base em.
Um calendário Lunissolar com base em.
